title: Chocolate cake with chocolate buttercream
ingredients: ['375g caster sugar', '225g plain flour', '65g best quality cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarb of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '250ml milk', '125ml vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225ml boiling water', 'Chocolate buttercream', '175g butter', '125g cocoa powder', '650g icing sugar', '150ml milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
